verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> [to wife] a daughter לֵוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi

וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> conceived הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתֵּ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and when she saw אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> him that he [was a] goodly ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> she וַֽתִּצְפְּנֵ֖הוּ <S%H6845><s%> [child] she hid שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> him three יְרָחִֽים׃ <S%H3391><s%> months

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָכְלָ֣ה <S%H3201><s%> And when she could עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> not longer הַצְּפִינוֹ֒ <S%H6845><s%> hide וַתִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> him she took לוֹ֙ תֵּ֣בַת <S%H8392><s%> for him an ark גֹּ֔מֶא <S%H1573><s%> of bulrushes וַתַּחְמְרָ֥ה <S%H2560><s%> and daubed בַחֵמָ֖ר <S%H2564><s%> it with slime וּבַזָּ֑פֶת <S%H2203><s%> and with pitch וַתָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put בָּהּ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֶּ֔לֶד <S%H3206><s%> the child וַתָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> therein and she laid בַּסּ֖וּף <S%H5488><s%> [it] in the flags עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> brink הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> by the river's

וַתֵּתַצַּ֥ב <S%H3320><s%> stood אֲחֹת֖וֹ <S%H269><s%> And his sister מֵרָחֹ֑ק <S%H7350><s%> afar off לְדֵעָ֕ה <S%H3045><s%> to wit מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יֵּעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> what would be done לֽוֹ׃

וַתֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> came down בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> And the daughter פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh לִרְחֹ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> to wash עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> [herself] at the river וְנַעֲרֹתֶ֥יהָ <S%H5291><s%> and her maidens הֹלְכֹ֖ת <S%H1980><s%> walked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> side הַיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> along by the river's וַתֵּ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and when she saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתֵּבָה֙ <S%H8392><s%> the ark בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among הַסּ֔וּף <S%H5488><s%> the flags וַתִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> she sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲמָתָ֖הּ <S%H519><s%> her maid וַתִּקָּחֶֽהָ <S%H3947><s%> to fetch

וַתִּפְתַּח֙ <S%H6605><s%> And when she had opened וַתִּרְאֵ֣הוּ <S%H7200><s%> [it] she saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֶּ֔לֶד <S%H3206><s%> the child וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold נַ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> and behold the babe בֹּכֶ֑ה <S%H1058><s%> wept וַתַּחְמֹ֣ל <S%H2550><s%> And she had compassion עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> on וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> on him and said מִיַּלְדֵ֥י <S%H3206><s%> children הָֽעִבְרִ֖ים <S%H5680><s%> This [is one] of the Hebrews' זֶֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> This

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲחֹתוֹ֮ <S%H269><s%> his sister אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter פַּרְעֹה֒ <S%H6547><s%> to Pharaoh's הַאֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go וְקָרָ֤אתִי <S%H7121><s%> and call לָךְ֙ אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> women מֵינֶ֔קֶת <S%H3243><s%> to thee a nurse מִ֖ן <S%H4480><s%> from הָעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrew וְתֵינִ֥ק <S%H3243><s%> that she may nurse לָ֖ךְ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <S%H3206><s%> the child

וַתֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said לָ֥הּ בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh's לֵ֑כִי <S%H1980><s%> to her Go וַתֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went הָֽעַלְמָ֔ה <S%H5959><s%> And the maid וַתִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֥ם <S%H517><s%> mother הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <S%H3206><s%> the child's

וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָ֣הּ בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh's הֵילִ֜יכִי <S%H1980><s%> to her Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֶּ֤לֶד <S%H3206><s%> this child הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this וְהֵינִקִ֣הוּ <S%H3243><s%> and nurse לִ֔י וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> it for me and I will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂכָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H7939><s%> [thee] thy wages וַתִּקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> took הָאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman הַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> the child וַתְּנִיקֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H5134><s%> and nursed

וַיִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> grew הַיֶּ֗לֶד <S%H3206><s%> And the child וַתְּבִאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and she brought לְבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> him unto Pharaoh's וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became לָ֖הּ לְבֵ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> and he became her son וַתִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> And she called שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> his name מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and she said כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> him out of the water מְשִׁיתִֽהוּ׃ <S%H4871><s%> Because I drew

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass in those days הָהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> those וַיִּגְדַּ֤ל <S%H1431><s%> was grown מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> when Moses וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> that he went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren וַיַּ֖רְא <S%H7200><s%> and looked בְּסִבְלֹתָ֑ם <S%H5450><s%> on their burdens וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> and he spied אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> an מִצְרִ֔י <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian מַכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> smiting אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> a עִבְרִ֖י <S%H5680><s%> an Hebrew מֵאֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> one of his brethren

וַיִּ֤פֶן <S%H6437><s%> And he looked כֹּה֙ <S%H3541><s%> this way וָכֹ֔ה <S%H3541><s%> and that way וַיַּ֖רְא <S%H7200><s%> and when he saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that [there was] no man וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְרִ֔י <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptian וַֽיִּטְמְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H2934><s%> and hid בַּחֽוֹל׃ <S%H2344><s%> him in the sand

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> And when he went out בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> behold two אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> he עִבְרִ֖ים <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews נִצִּ֑ים <S%H5327><s%> strove וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> together and he said לָֽרָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> to him that did the wrong לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תַכֶּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> Wherefore smitest רֵעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7453><s%> brother

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who שָֽׂמְךָ֞ <S%H7760><s%> Who made לְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thee שַׂ֤ר <S%H8269><s%> a prince וְשֹׁפֵט֙ <S%H8199><s%> and a judge עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> over הַלְהָרְגֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H2026><s%> thou to kill אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> are you אֹמֵ֔ר <S%H559><s%> over us? intendest כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you הָרַ֖גְתָּ <S%H2026><s%> me as thou killedst אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְרִ֑י <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וַיִּירָ֤א <S%H3372><s%> feared מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> Moses וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said אָכֵ֖ן <S%H403><s%> Surely נוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> is known הַדָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> this thing

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> Now when Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וַיְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> he sought לַהֲרֹ֣ג <S%H2026><s%> to slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וַיִּבְרַ֤ח <S%H1272><s%> fled מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> But Moses מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from the face פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and he sat down עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַבְּאֵֽר׃ <S%H875><s%> by a well

וּלְכֹהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> Now the priest מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> had seven בָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters וַתָּבֹ֣אנָה <S%H935><s%> and they came וַתִּדְלֶ֗נָה <S%H1802><s%> and drew וַתְּמַלֶּ֙אנָה֙ <S%H4390><s%> [water] and filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣רְהָטִ֔ים <S%H7298><s%> the troughs לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <S%H8248><s%> to water צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> flock אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <S%H1><s%> their father's

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> came הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> And the shepherds וַיְגָרְשׁ֑וּם <S%H1644><s%> and drove them away וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> stood up מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> but Moses וַיּ֣וֹשִׁעָ֔ן <S%H3467><s%> and helped וַיַּ֖שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> them and watered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנָֽם׃ <S%H6629><s%> their flock

וַתָּבֹ֕אנָה <S%H935><s%> And when they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רְעוּאֵ֖ל <S%H7467><s%> to Reuel אֲבִיהֶ֑ן <S%H1><s%> their father וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> he said מַדּ֛וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> How מִהַרְתֶּ֥ן <S%H4116><s%> so soon בֹּ֖א <S%H935><s%> [is it that] ye are come הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> age

וַתֹּאמַ֕רְןָ <S%H559><s%> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> an מִצְרִ֔י <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian הִצִּילָ֖נוּ <S%H5337><s%> delivered מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> us out of the hand הָרֹעִ֑ים <S%H7462><s%> of the shepherds וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and what דָּלֹ֤ה <S%H1802><s%> and also drew דָלָה֙ <S%H1802><s%> [water] enough לָ֔נוּ וַיַּ֖שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> for us and watered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> the flock

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בְּנֹתָ֖יו <S%H1323><s%> unto his daughters וְאַיּ֑וֹ <S%H346><s%> where לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> he עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ן <S%H5800><s%> And where [is] he? why [is] it [that] ye have left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man קִרְאֶ֥ן <S%H7121><s%> bewray ל֖וֹ וְיֹ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> him that he may eat לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַיּ֥וֹאֶל <S%H2974><s%> was content מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> with the man וַיִּתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> and he gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִפֹּרָ֥ה <S%H6855><s%> Zipporah בִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter לְמֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> And she bare בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> [him] a son וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name גֵּרְשֹׁ֑ם <S%H1647><s%> Gershom כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> for he said גֵּ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> I have been a stranger הָיִ֔יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have been בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5237><s%> in a strange פ

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> came בַיָּמִ֨ים <S%H3117><s%> of time הָֽרַבִּ֜ים <S%H7227><s%> many הָהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> those וַיָּ֙מָת֙ <S%H4191><s%> died מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיֵּאָנְח֧וּ <S%H584><s%> sighed בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> by reason of הָעֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> the bondage וַיִּזְעָ֑קוּ <S%H2199><s%> and they cried וַתַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> came up שַׁוְעָתָ֛ם <S%H7775><s%> and their cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> unto God מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> because הָעֲבֹדָֽה׃ <S%H5656><s%> by reason of the bondage
